content.p: Foundation degrees As a composition student, I was able to write and record pretty much anything I wanted: the Digital Composition Studio is the perfect support for the music technology modules, and the new state of the art recording facilities match those of a professional studio. Amy Summers, Music BA The University of Nottingham Lakeside Arts Centre University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD Admission enquiries All other enquiries - Telephone: +44 (0)115 951 5841 - Email: music-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Twitter
